description: Pierce Paris is a pompous sculptor with a big ego but an even bigger cock. When Pierce's assistant, the tall and fit Brandon Evans, discovers that Pierce has ordered a fake ass to be the template for his next sculpture he immediately intuits that Pierce is going to be using it for a lot more than just reference. Brandon waits until he catches Pierce fucking the toy then sneakily swaps his own ass in for Pierce's rubbery muse. When Pierce discovers the deception, he can't deny that Brandon's ass is just as good (if not significantly better) than the toy and gives the horny intern the pounding that he deserves in this sneaky sexy flip-fuck scene.
title: Ass Swap Part 5
